channel.title: Trying to Get Anonymous
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Trying to Get Anonymous" - Need to get bingo'd

item.title: Re: Trying to Get Anonymous
item.content:encoded:
Hey, I'm still looking to get Anonymous if anyone could help me out, I'd be willing to return the favour! As above, I'm still in Manifest but I'm now level 68.

Thanks!

item.title: Re: Trying to Get Anonymous
item.content:encoded:
Hey, I'm also trying to get Anonymous. If anyone could please bingo me with a note page, that would be great.

I'm in Manifest Village and I'm a level 62 Jonin (MaikuKun).

Thanks in advance guys!

item.title: Re: Trying to Get Anonymous
item.content:encoded:
Erm, don't resurrect ancient threads? >_> This thread died May 5th.

Please post your requests in the bingo thread next time. Thank you.

item.title: Re: Trying to Get Anonymous
item.content:encoded:
My chapters is:
aleksi0 51lvl l33t village
Snowball 53lvl Moon village

Thanks to you if you bingo me with note page.

item.title: Re: Trying to Get Anonymous
item.content:encoded:
If someone could Bingo me, I'd appreciate it.

Rongri of Alt Village.

item.title: Re: Trying to Get Anonymous
item.content:encoded: Thanks to Shadowind for the Bingo. I'm grateful and Adorac is unconscious.

item.title: Re: Trying to Get Anonymous
item.content:encoded: The favor has been returned Tsubani. Enjoy your new ally. =)

item.title: Re: Trying to Get Anonymous
item.content:encoded: If anyone still has a note page to spare, Adorac (level 44 jonin) of Yami village would be most grateful for being written down on it. Thanks in advance…

item.title: Re: Trying to Get Anonymous
item.content:encoded: Yeah, got him in the party. Had the mission 8 times today, got two jaws. Even with Stripes and WhiteEye.

item.title: Re: Trying to Get Anonymous
item.content:encoded:
Use Smoke Bombs.

My last alt to get Leg had a lot of smoke bombs and used them to get A-Level! Destroy a Hollow Stronghold time after time.

Don't forget MC Stripeypants.

item.title: Re: Trying to Get Anonymous
item.content:encoded: When ever you want. I've been keeping Hyuk in my party for pages and apples (sad that it's more reliable then running Cs.) while I hit the Reaper for jaws for All You Can Eat 2. It'll probably take at least two days to get them. :/ Ah well, what can you do?

item.title: Re: Trying to Get Anonymous
item.content:encoded: Thanks a lot Tsubani! Just let me know when/if you ever need bingo'd in return and I'll be glad to oblige you. =)

item.title: Re: Trying to Get Anonymous
item.content:encoded: There you go Jupiah. ;) I wouldn't mind if you returned the favor later either since I got Right with it. :)

item.title: Re: Trying to Get Anonymous
item.content:encoded: This is Nuriko, I have lots of stamina and several note pages on hand if they're needed … just say the word (and I'll get it right this time, I hope!)

item.title: Re: Trying to Get Anonymous
item.content:encoded:
Taliesan is also looking to be bingoed via notepage if you are so inclined :D

Bingoed: Thanks!

item.title: Re: Trying to Get Anonymous
item.content:encoded: Yes, I still need to be bingo'd if you're willing to do so.

item.title: Re: Trying to Get Anonymous
item.content:encoded: @Jupiah-I can bingo you now if you want to.

item.title: Re: Trying to Get Anonymous
item.content:encoded:
I am level 52 jonin and i need to be bingo'ed also to get anonymous. I would be willing to return the favor.

jediwaldo of alt village

item.title: Re: Trying to Get Anonymous
item.content:encoded: Well, if you still need it after this upcoming day roll. I'll try and slip a spy into Wiki from my 53 alt Kiji and hit you shortly afterwards.

item.title: Re: Trying to Get Anonymous
item.content:encoded: I was going to, but then I found out that my alt didn't have a spy in Wiki. =P

item.title: Trying to Get Anonymous
item.content:encoded: I'd like to get Anonymous soon, so if anyone needs to bingo someone for some reason, I'd appreciate it if you'd hit me. My character is Jupiah of The Wiki Village, and I'm a level 56 Sannin. Just make sure to use a Notepage please. Thanks in advance.
